channel.title: Item Unspawnable
channel.description:
Another basic bloody thing i should know!
How would i make items unspawnable in a PI?
Thanks
-NumberEleven

item.title: Item Unspawnable
item.dc:creator: @NumberEleven NumberEleven
item.description:
@NumberEleven wrote:

Just trying now, thanks for the good suggestions.

Read full topic

item.title: Item Unspawnable
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

private static final int[] UNSPAWNABLE_ITEMS = new int[] {
    // items in here
};
// ...
// normal input validation
if (command.equals("pickup")) {
    int id = -1;
    int amount = -1;
    try {
        id = Integer.parseInt(args[0]);
        amount = Integer.parseInt(args[1]);
    }
    catch (final Exception e) {
        e.printStackTrace();
        return;
    }
    for (final int item : UNSPAWNABLE_ITEMS) {
        if (id == item) {
            player.sendMessage("You cannot spawn this item.");
            return;
        }
    }
    // do normal stuff here
}

Read full topic

item.title: Item Unspawnable
item.dc:creator: @asshole_rule asshole_rule
item.description:
@asshole_rule wrote:

In your pickup command

if(itemName.contains("itemnamehere")) { c.sendMessage("you can't get this item"); return; }

Might work.
